content: The Server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object in S3.

comment.text: The AmazonSSE algorithm is used as a placeholder to describe the server-side encryption method used when storing objects in Amazon S3. This text appears on a tooltip in a settings page, providing context about the available encryption options for consumer storage.

usage.context:
/>
{this.SSEPlaceholder} {renderTooltip(t("AmazonSSETip"), "sse-method-tooltip")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly verbose and doesn't accurately convey the concise meaning of the English original. "خدمة التخزين السحابي المقدمة من أمازون ويب" (Cloud storage service provided by Amazon Web Services) is unnecessary and adds complexity. The core meaning of 'algorithm used when storing this object in S3' is diluted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: خوارزمية التشفير المستخدمة لتخزين هذا الكائن في Amazon S3.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The inclusion of 'Amazon' before 'S3' could be inconsistent with other documentation. It's more common to simply use 'S3'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: خوارزمية التشفير المستخدمة لتخزين هذا الكائن في S3.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Սերվերի կողմից գաղտնագրման ալգորիթմը, որն օգտագործվում է այս օբյեկտը S3-ում պահելու ժամանակ:" is overly literal and clunky. The phrase "Սերվերի կողմից գաղտնագրման ալգորիթմը" can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մերսված է այս օբյեկտը S3-ում պահելու համար գործածվող սերվերի կողմից գաղտնագրման ալգորիթմը։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the sentence isn't ideal. It creates a somewhat formal tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the colon for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ຂັ້ນຕອນການເຂົ້າລະຫັດດ້ານເຊີບເວີ' is a literal translation of 'encryption algorithm' as 'encryption steps'. It's not the most accurate way to convey the meaning of 'algorithm'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອົງການເຂົ້າລະຫັດດ້ານເຊີບເວີ (Ongkan Khao Rahat Dan Cheabver)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ໃນເວລາເກັບຮັກສາວັດຖຸນີ້ຢູ່ໃນ S3' could be more concise and natural. 'ນີ້' (this) can be omitted as it is implied.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເວລາເກັບຮັກສາວັດຖຸໃນ S3

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සේවාදායකයේ පස සංකේතන ඇල්ගොරිතමය' (sewadaayakay paha sankethana algorithamaya) doesn't accurately convey 'Server-side encryption algorithm'. 'පස' (paha) means 'soil' or 'earth'. It should relate to the encryption process or the algorithm itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම වස්තුව S3 තුළ ගබඩා කිරීමේදී භාවිතා කරන සංකේතන ක්‍රමයක් (samekethana krimaayak) (This is the encryption method used when storing this object in S3.) or  සේවාදායක-පිහිටුවන සංකේතන ක්‍රමය (sewadaayaka-pihita wana samekethana krimaaya) (Server-side encryption method).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not critical, consider separating the terms 'S3' and 'ගබඩා කිරීමේදී' with a space for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම වස්තුව S3 තුළ ගබඩා කිරීමේදී...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'predmeta' could be improved. While technically correct, 'datoteke' would be a more natural and common term for 'object' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritem za šifriranje na strani strežnika, uporabljen pri shranjevanju te datoteke v S3.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'шифровања' is spelled correctly, but might be perceived as slightly formal for a user-facing setting. A slightly less formal option might improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'криптовања' as a potentially more accessible alternative, although 'шифровања' is technically correct.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure 'Алгоритам шифровања на серверу који се користи...' could be slightly restructured for better flow in Serbian. It is a bit long and complex.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider something like: 'Алгоритам за шифровање на серверу који се користи за чување овог објекта у S3.' or 'Алгоритам криптовања који се користи приликом чувања овог објекта у S3.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'šifrovanja' could be improved. While technically correct, 'kriptovanja' is more commonly used in technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritam kriptovanja na serveru koji se koristi prilikom čuvanja ovog objekta u S3.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Sunucu' (Server) is incorrectly capitalized. It should be lowercase 'sunucu'.
